column4: guys, how do I get /dev/hda5 ( a fat32 partition) to mount a) now and b) on startup?

Diskmounter Script   http://www.ubuntulinux.nl/files/diskmounter  for mounting NTFS, Fat32 and NFS Drives Most people need to restart X before the Drive Icons show on the desktop  .. after saving the page to your desktop use terminal and type cd /home/your_username_here/Desktop
sudo cp /etc/fstab ~/fstab.backup            First to make a backup
